column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The cafe is cute and we'd eaten there before - sandwiches
column3: etc are all excellent. But it's the cake that Kim and the artists made that really blew me away. I had a pretty simple description: please make a delicious
column4: veggie garden themed cake for my dad's birthday. Wow did they deliver. The cake is delicious and the decor absolutely spectacular from every angle. So very happy. Thanks!
